game.name: Beef
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Clock in and discover the dark secret behind one of the world’s favorite canned meat brand in Beef, a surreal horror experience like no other.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Clock in and discover the dark secret behind one of the world’s favorite canned meat brand in Beef, a surreal horror experience like no other.

reviewHighlights.text: Cute game, short but dealing with horrifying subject matter. A shame that there could be parallels in the real world. Reasonable price for a short exp...
